member.name: M:Contoso.SB.API.Controllers.ClassificationController.SubmitDoc(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.IFormFile)
member.summary: Uploads a document to Azure storage
member.returns: The result of the uploaded document
member.param: One of the following ID, StoreShelf, Face, Generic, Unidentified which will determine the cognitive operations to be executed
Flag to indicate if operations need to execute immediately or will be queued
The binary of the document being processed
